main: Hits the 7 targets with the least HP. Only damages enemy targets. Allied targets are healed on a heads hit. Applies {status:Combustion} on tails hit regardless of target. Very low power.
{status:GainSinStockAdder} allows allies to generate more E.G.O resources but is very inconsistent.

passiveList.desc: Tails Coins inflict 1 [Combustion] if hitting an enemy.
passiveList.name: Stew Spewage
